name: INAddTasksIntentResponse
desc: Your response to a request to add tasks to a task list.

items.name: init(code: INAddTasksIntentResponseCode, userActivity: NSUserActivity?)
items.desc: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

items.name: var code: INAddTasksIntentResponseCode
items.desc: The code indicating whether you successfully handled the intent.

items.name: enum INAddTasksIntentResponseCode
items.desc: Constants indicating the state of the response.

items.name: var addedTasks: [INTask]?
items.desc: The tasks that you added to the task list.

items.name: var modifiedTaskList: INTaskList?
items.desc: The task list that you modified.
